item.title: Bangladesh devoid of form, balance and confidence - ESPNcricinfo.com
item.description:
ESPNcricinfo.com
Bangladesh devoid of form, balance and confidence
ESPNcricinfo.com
Thursday's loss to Sri Lanka was Bangladesh's seventh consecutive ODI defeat. Given the form Bangladesh have shown in this format against New Zealand in the series previous to the one against Sri Lanka, this slump looks very much out of place.

item.title: Limca Book's latest edition dedicated to women - Business Standard

Limca Book's latest edition dedicated to women
Business Standard
Celebrating women achievers across various fields, the Limca Book of Records Thursday launched its 25th edition on the theme "Empowering Women". An event held at the India Habitat Centre here felicitated 25 "inspirational women" as "People of the Year".
